english.question: ЁЯФ╖Why is the website link like thisтЭУ
english.answer:
Answer: ЁЯТаThe website link appears this way because it's hosted on my personal GitHub repository.
Since this is not a commercial application, I opted for this solution to reduce costs.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖Why do I have to pay for the Access Plus editionтЭУ
english.answer: Answer: Some of the APIs used in this application are not free, and IтАЩm also working on building an ecosystem around it to support ongoing development and maintenance.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖Can I change the device after activationтЭУ
english.answer:
Answer: ЁЯТа Yes, of course you can. You can change the activated device as many times as you like, and you can activate using the same key even after setting up new Windows. You don't even have to seek out assistance.
But keep in mind that after abandoning a device, you cannot activate it again using the same key ЁЯФС.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖Why do some antivirus software flag the Installer and Portable versionтЭУ
english.answer:
Answer: ЁЯТаApplications of this nature require a code signature certificate to facilitate distribution without encountering flagging issues. As an individual without organizational backing, navigating this process can be challenging.
By installing this application through the Microsoft Store, you can avoid encountering the flagging issue.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖Is It Safe to Use Nms KonthoтЭУ
english.answer:
Answer: ЁЯТаYes, it's safe to use any version of Nms Kontho, as long as you download it from the official website or Microsoft Store.
The same application is packaged in three formats: an installer (.exe), a portable version, and an MSIX package for the Microsoft Store. Each option is safe; however, the MSIX package undergoes a longer certification process to appear in the store.
We offer both installer and portable versions outside the Microsoft Store to avoid some of its limitations, like the lack of access to older versions and the delay in releasing updates. Microsoft Store isnтАЩt ideal for version migration, so these download options provide flexibility and timely access to the latest releases.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖Our Limitations
english.answer:
Answer: ЁЯТаKontho currently has approximately 200,000 active users. As we are not yet in the commercial phase, managing such a large user base with a small team poses significant challenges.We recommend that users with limited computer knowledge opt for the free version of Kontho instead of paid plans.
we encourage users to troubleshoot minor issues independently, as relying on our team for small problems is discouraged. Currently, we do not offer a dedicated 24/7 user support service. If possible, seek help from an experienced person nearby.
During times of high traffic, we may not be able to respond to everyone immediately and we may need to prioritize messages based on their urgency. To facilitate faster support, please provide all necessary details in a single message when reaching out.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖Are Mac or Linux versions availableтЭУ
english.answer: Answer:ЁЯТаThe release of a stable Mac or Linux version may take over a year.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖How can I get a free trial
english.answer: Answer:ЁЯТаYou can use the Pro version for free each time you update the application to the latest version. We have discontinued the use of free trial keys due to misuse.

english.question: ЁЯФ╖How can I request for a featureтЭУ
english.answer: Answer:ЁЯТаIf you wish to request a feature for the upcoming version of Nms Kontho, please reach out to the developer via their Gmail at mdnabilmustofa2021@gmail.com

bangla.question: ЁЯФ╖ржлрзНрж░рзА ржЯрзНрж░рж╛рзЯрж╛рж▓ ржХрзАржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржХрж░ржмрзЛтЭУ
bangla.answer:
ржЙрждрзНрждрж░: ЁЯТаржкрзНрж░рждрзНржпрзЗржХржмрж╛рж░ ржирждрзБржи ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржнрж╛рж░рзНрж╕ржи рж░рж┐рж▓рж┐ржЬ рж╣рж▓рзЗ рж╕ржм ржлрж┐ржЪрж╛рж░ ржЖржирж▓ржХ ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯ, ржЯрзЗрж╕рзНржЯрж┐ржВ ржПрж░ ржЬржирзНржпред
ржЕржкржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржПрж░ ржХрж╛рж░ржгрзЗ ржЯрзНрж░рж╛рзЯрж╛рж▓ key ржмржирзНржз ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред

bangla.question: ЁЯФ╖ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржлрж┐ржЪрж╛рж░ ржПрж░ ржЬржирзНржп рж░рж┐ржХрзЛрзЯрзЗрж╕рзНржЯ ржХрзАржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржХрж░ржмрзЛтЭУ
bangla.answer: ржЙрждрзНрждрж░: ЁЯТа ржпржжрж┐ ржХрзЛржи ржлрж┐ржЪрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржХржерж╛ ржорж╛ржерж╛рзЯ ржЖрж╕рзЗ рждрж╛рж╣рж▓рзЗ рж╕рж░рж╛рж╕рж░рж┐ ржорзЗржЗрж▓ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗржи ржПржЗ ржарж┐ржХрж╛ржирж╛рзЯ: mdnabilmustofa2021@gmail.com
